0: Overall the Hotel was great providing their own amenities plus use of the Casa Marine just a few blocks away
We planned a family destination wedding at the Keys and the dinner reception was held at The Reach
The staff there were very friendly and although we did not take full advantage of all the amenities on offer the ones we used were fine
We were told that we could also use the facilities of the Casa Marina the sister property so we went over there before we left
our room was nice clean and had all the amenities you would expect
Gift shop had plenty of necessities and extras
BUT 1 st night there was music in the hall for ambiance
The hotel was average as were facilities in the room
The lobby is clean and very pleasant smelling The amenities are good and the view with the pier is spectacular
1: The elevator by the pool was down for 3 days and we had to walk a mile out of the way to get to the room we were in
The facility left a lot to be desired
As in reviews they have logged from the time we are here I could not find a cracked tile around the pool and expect there to be cleaning carts in the hallways they never blocked our walkway
One of the two lobby elevators never wirked for the week we were there
Would like for them to have had some coffee in the lobby took away when the gift shop opens
The building itself is shabby with dirty corners and stairwells a dirty elevator which was overdue for inspection
Heck the cleaning staff would n’t even let my wife and I in an elevator
The facilities are outdated and to put it bluntly somewhat disgusting
Elevators out if service temporarily but staff was very nice
Two of the three elevators were broken our entire visit
